CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 13, 1960, pg. 24, reads: "In Play-Offs - Finishing its first season tied for first place with St. Clair Village, the Satellites, managed by Henry (Cody) Simpson, coached by Walter Robinson and Thomas (Babyman) Allen, and sponsored by O. T. Whiting, are now in the play-offs. Members of the outstanding team are (standing, left to right) Manager Simpson, Co-captain Nettie Myers, Josephine Jackson, Betty Lewis, Shirley Brooks, Anna Mae Johnson, Arlene Washington, Captain Mildred Allen, Beatrice Mahaffey, Coach Thomas C. Allen and (kneeling) Geraldine Frye, Carole Campbell, Phoebe Buchanan, Emily Neal, Rosalie Griffin, Muriel Brandon. Not shown are Walter Robinson, coach; Irene Brower, Corrine Hinton and Marty Jackson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of "Satilites" softball team, standing from left: manager Henry "Cody" Simpson, co-captain Nettie Myers, Josephine Jackson, Betty Lewis, Shirley Brooks, Anna Mae Johnson, Arlene Washington, Captain Mildred Allen, Beatrice Mahaffey, Coach Thomas C. Allen; kneeling: Geraldine Frye, Carole Campbell, Phoebe Buchanan, Emily Neal, Rosalie Griffin, and Muriel Brandon posed on field
